page.title: 19HOLIDAY FESTIVAL PENARTH
page.content: The{festival}lasts 16 days this year. The theme is the 20's and 30's.Floats, cars and jazz-bands are a colourful sight in the carnival.There is a"Miss Penarth"contest yearly.The guides have chosen"Bugsy Malone"as their theme.A colouring competition for infants is held at the library.Exhibitions by the Local History Society are{held.A dog {show,a baby show and"Donkey Derby"are held by the Round Table on the Cliff- Walk.There is water-skiing,6-a-side football,a fun run and angling.Even- lode girls plan to join the Lacrosse Mini Tournament.A theatre company will present"Arthur,King of the Welsh"as street theatre.There is an open-air {Art Display}by local artists.Entertai- nments include barbecues,barn dances, discos,treasure{hunts,Punch & Judy,and concerts.The festival is full of fun and enjoyment for all ages.
